pr_title: Sorting order of offers appropriately by min/max range

timeline.message:
Sort order of offers appropriately by min/max range

This change fixes an issue with sorting the offer list when the amount is shown as a range.
In OfferBookView::activate() we add a listener for the sortTypeProperty on amountColumn and
volumeColumn. When the sortType is changed we set the comparator to be the approprate property
of the Offer; either getAmount/getMinAmount; getVolume/getMinVolume.

Fixes #3818

timeline.bodyText: As we had issues in the past concerning using no brackets for one line conditionals we decided to use always {}
